short_summary: Radium Aqua Court Foundation Repair - Kootenay National Park
description: Works includes repairs to the twin box culverts beneath the pool deck, upgrades with the Sinclair Creek Channel beneath the building, erosion protection of Sinclair Creek Channel downstream of the proposed twin box culverts and cool pool repairs.
